name: Hisense 55" E6 Cinema Series QLED 4K UHD Smart Fire TV (55E6QF, 2025 Model)
pros: Excellent HDR support with Dolby Vision and adaptive HDR10+
Strong feature set for the price, including QLED and Dolby Atmos
Useful AI Light Sensor for automatic brightness adjustment
Includes Filmmaker Mode for content as intended
Modern Wi-Fi 6 connectivity for stable streaming
cons: Lower customer rating (3.9) suggests potential quality or consistency issues
Motion Rate 120 indicates a standard 60Hz panel
Gaming features are basic (Game Mode Plus only, no VRR/ALLM)
Limited number of reviews (19) makes long-term reliability less certain
